params.name: inputs
params.description: The inputs and targets of the model.The dictionary will be unpacked before being fed to the model. Most models expect the targets under theargument labels. Check your models documentation for all accepted arguments.

params.name: prediction_loss_only
params.description: Whether or not to return the loss only.

params.name: ignore_keys
params.description: A list of keys in the output of your model (if it is a dictionary) that should be ignored whengathering predictions.
